hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Side Room Near Lower Lizalfos

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Fire Temple Compass# and #a Map of the Forest Temple#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Red Potion Bottle#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.
